page.title: 12LIFE AT BRAMFORD HALL
page.content: It has a roof and I have put straw on the floor.If I climb along a branch,I come to another part.It is open and without a roof.It has three low walls. If I go along the branch a bit further, I come to another part. Bramford Hall is on the outskirts of Bramford across the A 1100 from the village. Our house used to be a big mansion belonging to Lord and Lady Lorraine. They owned several big houses and decided that they didn't need this one any more.So they knocked it down, leaving just a little bit standing, which is now our house. Our garden is 7.5 acres in size and is mainly woodland.We see a lot of birds and animals and flowers.In our garden there are three big trees.They are Redwood trees,the biggest in the world.Ours are not fully grown yet.
